alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued November 28 at 3:16AM EST until November 29 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph will produce blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Wyoming, Chautauqua, Cattaraugus, and Southern Erie counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult with poor visibility and deep snow cover on roads. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow and most significant impacts are expected through this afternoon, when snowfall rates over 1" per hour will occur within the heaviest snow bands.
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
